trans-unit.source: Serves as a base class for derived classes that import SOAP transmission protocols into XML Web services.
trans-unit.target: 用作导入 XML Web 服务的 SOAP 传输协议的派生类的基类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter"></xref> class.

When overridden in a derived class, this method uses information contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object model (available through the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportContext*> property) to add transport-specific code to the class being generated.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写此方法使用信息中包含<xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>对象模型 (可通过<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportContext*>属性) 以将特定于传输的代码添加到正在生成的类。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapTransportImporter.ImportContext*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> performing the import action.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个引用， <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"> </xref>执行导入操作。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can use this property to get detailed information about the current import context, such as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> object model, the current class name, or the current method name.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以使用此属性以获取有关当前的导入上下文中，详细的信息，如<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>对象模型、 当前的类名称或当前的方法名称。</xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.SoapProtocolImporter"></xref> performing the import action.
When overridden in a derived class, this method determines whether the specified transport protocol is supported by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写此方法确定 XML Web 服务是否支持指定的传输协议。

trans-unit.source: A URI representing the transport protocol to be checked.
trans-unit.target: 一个 URI，表示的传输协议要检查。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the transport protocol is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果支持传输协议;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
